content:
think like a marketing and branding strategist - create a brief for a brand positioning presentation for the fashion brand Autumn Adeigbo. include scope of work, objective and project overview. Here is a description about the brand Autumn Adeigbo: AUTUMN ADEIGBO is a colorful and conversational fashion brand that allows women to wear their values on their garments. 

We create a positive impact on the lives of each person who touches our product, from maker to end user. Inspiring a movement towards a more expressive and colorful world, where women stand out from the crowd, supporting each other across cultures through our product. 

We are the first-to-mind brand for cool, ethical and globally influenced fashion and lifestyle products, built on a mission of: culture, color, and conscience.

• Culture- Diversity seen in our team, customers and marketing initiatives.
• Color- Our girl is the bright spot of every room she enters.
• Conscience- Prioritizing people and planet alongside profit. CULTURE
We create Culture
Globally sourced brand that connects women across cultures through our products. Diverse founder, team, marketing and customer base. Autumn is a self-made founder.
COLOR
We create Color
Collection is inspired by dressing in vibrant prints and color. Our girl is the bright spot of every room.

CONSCIENCE
We create Conscience
Our made-to-order clothing is manufactured in the USA in women-owned factories. We are committed to ethical practices and make a habit of giving back.
